10#ifndef _GNU_SOURCE
11# define _GNU_SOURCE
12#endif
13
14#include <stdlib.h>
15#include "internal/cryptlib.h"
16
17char *ossl_safe_getenv(const char *name)
18{
19#if defined(__GLIBC__) && defined(__GLIBC_PREREQ)
20# if __GLIBC_PREREQ(2, 17)
21# define SECURE_GETENV
22 return secure_getenv(name);
23# endif
24#endif
25
26#ifndef SECURE_GETENV
27 if (OPENSSL_issetugid())
28 return NULL;
29 return getenv(name);
30#endif
31}
32
